briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Glycemic Effects, Safety, and Tolerability of Exenatide Once Weekly in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (DURATION-5)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Open-Label, Parallel-Group, Comparator-Controlled, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Glycemic Effects, Safety, and Tolerability of Exenatide Once Weekly in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
summary: This study will compare the effects of commercially manufactured exenatide once weekly and exenatide BID in subjects whose type 2 diabetes is managed with diet and exercise alone or with oral antidiabetic medications. The study will examine glycemic control (as measured by HbA1C), safety, and tolerability.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in HbA1c From Baseline to Week 24
